text: Our Nova Scotia South Coast Road Trip begins here at the famous Peggy's Cove.
peggy's cove is such a pretty fishing village
It dates back to 1811 and it was started by just 6 families who were granted 800 acres of land by the government.
Today it is still a working fishing village and this is how people have made their living for the past 200 years.
Ready to go out on a Peggy's Cove Boat Tours, get to see that lighthouse from a completely different perspective.
we're going kayaking in Nova Scotia, Woo!

We're at the very picturesque town of Lunenburg here in Nova Scotia
Here's a little insider tip for you, come up to the golf course across the bay for a gorgeous picture at sunset

because hey, you know what? It's the thing to do here.

to see historic lighhouses like the four point lighthouse in Liverpoole.
